com.munger.passwordkeeper.struct

Class AES256

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.munger.passwordkeeper.struct.AES256

  • public class AES256
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper for the JNI AES and MD5 calls. This class provides functionality for the Advanced Encryption Standard algorithms and the MD5 hash algorithm. Run ndk_build in the jni folder to regenerate the library for this wrapper. The library is located in libs/armeabi/libaes256.so

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int context
      A pointer containing the C object that does the encryption
      private java.lang.String password
      The password to use for encryption and decryption

    • Constructor Summary

      AES256(java.lang.String password)
      Initialize the AES objects with the provided password

    • Constructor Detail

      • AES256

        public AES256(java.lang.String password)
        Initialize the AES objects with the provided password
        Parameters:
        password - any plaintext password will do. They are converted to an MD5 hash before being used by AES.

      • encode

        public java.lang.String encode(java.lang.String target)
        encode the provided string to ciphertext
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        encoded ciphertext converted to hex notation

      • decode

        public java.lang.String decode(java.lang.String target)
        decode the provided ciphertext to plaintext
        Parameters:
        target - the hex encoded ciphertext previously generated by the encode function
        Returns:
        plaintext decoded from the ciphertext

      • init

        private int init(java.lang.String password)
        Initialize the AES encryption object
        Parameters:
        password - the plaintext password to use as the encryption key
        Returns:
        a C pointer to the AES object

      • destroy

        private void destroy(int context)
        Clean up the AES object. Free any allocated variables
        Parameters:
        context - the C pointer returned by init

      • encode

        private java.lang.String encode(int context,
                      java.lang.String target)
        Encrypt the provided plaintext
        Parameters:
        context - the AES object C pointer returned by init
        target - the plaintext to convert
        Returns:
        ciphertext encoded in hex or null on failure

        private java.lang.String decode(int context,
